FuncDef: This command configures the reference bandwidth that provides the basis of bandwidth relative costing.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the reference bandwidth in kilobits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4000000000.
Specifies the reference bandwidth in terabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4.
Specifies the reference bandwidth in Gigabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.
Specifies the reference bandwidth in Megabits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.
Specifies the reference bandwidth in kilobits per second expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 999.

ExtraInfo: Default: no reference-bandwidth - No reference bandwidth is defined. All interfaces have a metric of 10.
